attr.a:
Use the *Bayes' rule*.

```math
\begin{aligned}
  &P(G|E^c) \\
  &= \cfrac{P(E^c|G)P(G)}{P(E^c)} \\
  &= \cfrac{P(E^c|G)P(G)}{P(G \cap E^c) + P(G^c \cap E^c)} \\
  &= \cfrac{0.72}{0.72 + 0.14} \\
  &\approx 0.8372 \\
\end{aligned}
```
